article: Dear Marry , M y name is Alice Green . I'm  an American  girl . I'm fourteen years olD. My birthday is March 3 My family is in Beijing now , but my grandparents are still in America . My parents are  _  in a school , they teach English . I have two brothers but  _  sisters . They are Tom and Tony . Tom plays  _  well . He is on the school soccer team . Tony likes  _  very much . He is member of an art cluB. My family all love  _  . We think China is great . I often read some Chinese history books . I think they are very  _  . I like playing the piano . I join the  _  club of my school . Each year we have an Art Festival . My brothers and I study  _  in our school . We are good students . Let's  _  good friends . Please write soon .
